Posts.Content: All4mygirls wrote: Hello, I am a mother of 2 girls, ages 2 and 3. I 25 years old. 2 month I felt a lump in my chest. I brought it up to my obgyn during my annual but lump was not there at the time...the next month, I start experiencing pain in my left breast under nipple.. It hurt so bad, I didnt want my little girls to lay on me. I went to see obgyn who said it was an infection. He gave me painkillers and antibiotics. He referred to a surgeon. I seen the surgeon 2 weeks later who could not drain by sticking needle in lump. He set me an appointment for a ultrasound and mammogram.Pain is not there anymore but lump is.Lump is not big as it once was put it has cause a big indention in my skin. I size DDD breast.I may add pain came overnight..Lump came 2 days later Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried.. All4mygirls All4mygirls
